revised_title: Evolution of the Precambrian Crust: A Study of the Rhodesian Archaean Craton
tldr: This article discusses the evolution of the Precambrian crust, focusing on the Rhodesian Archaean craton. It examines the greenstone belts, the various geological formations, and the main stages of the craton's development from the earliest Archaean to the intrusion of the Great Dyke and early Proterozoic events.
